subject: You've received a postcard from a family member!
body:
Good day.

Your family member has sent you an ecard from koptb.hk.

Send free ecards from koptb.hk with your choice of colors, words and music.

Your ecard will be available with us for the next 30 days. If you wish to keep 
the ecard longer, you may save it on your computer or take a print.

To view your ecard, choose from any of the following options:

--------
OPTION 1
--------

Click on the following Internet address or
copy & paste it into your browser's address box.

http://koptb.hk/?4814655dc21c83715e8517a32e6b9ea6

--------
OPTION 2
--------

Copy & paste the ecard number in the "View Your Card" box at 
http://koptb.hk/

Your ecard number is
4814655dc21c83715e8517a32e6b9ea6

Best wishes,
Postmaster,
koptb.hk

*If you would like to send someone an ecard, you can do so at 
http://koptb.hk/
